Description: Pottery ostracon bearing Coptic. Contains a liturgical text, 'Prayer of the kiss of peace'.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Henri Édouard Naville (1893-94, on behalf of EEF)
Curator's comments: Studied with a view to publication by Mihálykó 2021.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (390616) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/390616)
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: O.Crum 5 (text edition abbreviation according to Oates et al 2001)
